channel.title: Minimum Spanning Tree on grid47

item.title: Leetcode 1584: Min Cost to Connect All Points
item.description: You are given a list of points on a 2D plane, represented as coordinates [x, y]. The cost of connecting two points is defined by the Manhattan distance, which is calculated as |xi - xj| + |yi - yj|. Your task is to return the minimum total cost required to connect all the points. A valid connection between points must form a connected graph, where there is exactly one simple path between any two points.
